content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"French version of the training is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":82052,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/557a292a-fd30-49a5-b85c-dbc54f707396/France - French - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/557a292a-fd30-49a5-b85c-dbc54f707396/France - French - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"fileName\":\"France - French - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"name\":\"France - French - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"557a292a-fd30-49a5-b85c-dbc54f707396\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English version:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems France, \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"having its registered office at 15 Rue de Milan 75009 Paris, France (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") recognizes our employees' right to privacy and the protection of personal data.  We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal data\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this document is to present to you, in a clear and transparent manner, the policy of EPAM concerning the protection of your personal data as a member of the company's staff: what data is collected, why is it processed, by whom, with whom is it shared, what are your rights. The implementation of this notice is part of the new legislation on the protection of personal data and, in particular, Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of April 27, 2016 (known as \\\"RGPD\\\") and Law No. 78-17 revised of January 6, 1978, relating to computers, files and freedoms and its implementing decree. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This notice complements the provisions of your employment contract on this subject.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
